Description.Text: The hotel lies on the seashore. It is situated on the outskirts of the city of Vlore in Southern Albania. Vlore is the perfect place to spend some relaxing days by the sea. Vlore is easily accessible by ferry from Brindisi and Bari in Southern Italy, or by road from Tirana Airport, which is 140 km away from the hotel.

The hotel offers spacious and comfortable rooms. All rooms come with a private en suite bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. Rooms also come equipped with a direct dial telephone and minibar. Standard in-room amenities include satellite/cable TV and Internet access. Furthermore, individually regulated air conditioning is provided in all accommodation as standard. Each room features a balcony or terrace, and most rooms offer a sea view.

This beach hotel comprises a total of 85 rooms. The hotel is modern, has its own private beach and offers all of the facilities, which guests would expect from a hotel of this class. Guests are welcomed at the 24-hour reception desk, which also offers a hotel safe. Younger guests will enjoy the children's playground. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar, and dine in the restaurant. Meeting facilities for conferences and seminars are available to business travellers. Guests can enjoy the convenience of Internet access. They can also take advantage of the room and laundry services. Those arriving by car may leave their vehicles in the hotel car park.
